mapper.select: SELECT c.pic_url as picUrl, c.num_iid as numId, a.goods_name as goodsName, a.quantity as quantity, a.price as price, a.spec as spec, a.sku_id skuId FROM js_am_order_detail a LEFT JOIN tb_sku b ON a.sku_id = b.sku_id LEFT JOIN tb_product c ON c.num_iid = b.num_iid WHERE a.document_code = #{documentCode}
